farchievements.Settings.EnableChatBarBut.Hint: Allows to access Farchivements from the chat bar.

farchievements.Settings.EnableAchievemen.Hint: Posts a message when a player gained an achievement.

farchievements.Settings.EnableConfettiSu.Hint: Enable Support for the Confetti module.

farchievements.Settings.EnableContextBut.Text: Enable the button for the player-list context menu
farchievements.Settings.EnableContextBut.Hint: Enable the button for the player-list context menu.

farchievements.Settings.loadPerPage.Hint: How many achievements should be loaded at once.

farchievements.Settings.GameSettingsButt.Hint: Enable the button within the Game Settings tab.

farchievements.Settings.PlayerBackColor.Hint: Uses player color as background colorsheme for the achievementscreen.

farchievements.Settings.HideUnknown.Hint: Completely hide Unknown Achievements from your players.

farchievements.Settings.UnknownName.Hint: Standard name of unknown Achievement (leave empty to disable).

farchievements.Settings.AlwaysShowName.Hint: Always displays the name of the achievement

farchievements.Settings.UnknownDes.Hint: Standard description of unknown Achievement (leave empty to disable)

farchievements.Settings.AlwaysShowDes.Hint: Always displays the description of the achievement.

farchievements.Settings.DescriptionOnHov.Hint: Display the description only when the achievement is hovered.

farchievements.Settings.standardBackgrou.Text: Standard Background for the achievements viewer
farchievements.Settings.standardBackgrou.Hint: Standard Background behind the achievements list.

farchievements.Settings.bannerBackground.Hint: Background for the achievement banner (2000 x 180 px).

farchievements.Settings.achievementSting.Hint: Long audio that will be played during certain animations.
This is the volume all stingers will be played on, I recommend to keep it low.

farchievements.Settings.achpretext.Hint: Prefix that is infront of the achievement name within the banner.

farchievements.Settings.greyscale.Hint: Displays the achievement icon but grayscaled instead of the mystery icon.

farchievements.Settings.AchievementData.Hint: The data for the achievements is saved here !!DONT TOUCH!!

farchievements.Settings.achievementdataN.Hint: The new data for the achievements is saved here !!DONT TOUCH!!

farchievements.Settings.ClientDataList.Hint: Will be synced between clients !!DONT TOUCH!!

farchievements.Settings.bannerAnimation.Hint: Select an animation and soundtype for the banner

farchievements.Settings.achievementSound.Hint: Short audio that will be played during certain animations.
This is the volume the sound will be played on, I recommend to keep it low.

farchievements.Notification.PlayerIdChanged: Player ID's Changed, purged Player with ID:
farchievements.Notification.NoAchievements: This user doesn't have any Achievements.
farchievements.Notification.OverwriteWithNothing: You shouldn't overwrite the data with nothing.
farchievements.Notification.InvalidData: This data seems to be invalid, make sure to copy the correct data.
farchievements.Notification.Overwritten: This World's Achievements have been overwritten.

farchievements.Title: Farchievements
farchievements.Html.PushChangesNow: Click to push changes right now

farchievements.Html.ImportExport.Title: Farchievements Import/Export
farchievements.Html.ImportExport.Body: This is a small tool to import and export your Achievements. Make sure to backup everything before you even think about overriding!!

farchievements.Html.SanitySaver.Title: Farchievements | sanity saver
farchievements.Html.SanitySaver.Body2: new achievements to see, do you want to skip the animations or see them all?
